alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 1:24PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A thunderstorm along the Montana border will move east toward Island Park and Henrys Lake through 215 PM MDT... At 120 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorms 12 miles northeast of Kilgore, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 35 mph and occasional lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could create difficult boating conditions on area lakes. Locations impacted include... Henrys Lake, Shotgun Village, Island Park Reservoir, and Sheridan Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Island Park Reservoir or Henrys Lake, you may want to begin making your way to shore now. Strong winds can create rough chop and difficult boating conditions. Lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
